directions: While pasta is cooking, saute onion and garlic in oil for about 5 minutes.  Remove to bowl.  Add shrimp to remaining drippings, and cook for about 3 minutes. Stir in artichoke hearts, wine, lemon juice, lemon peel, salt, pepper, and cooked onion.  Heat to boiling over high heat.  Reduce heat to low; simmer, covered, for 4 to 5 minutes.  Toss with pasta and parsley.  Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp - peeled and deveined
title: Shrimp and Artichoke Linguine
